name: ArcGIS Layer Package
summary: Learn about .LPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LPK files can be used by both ArcMap and ArcGlobe, which are included as part of the ArcGIS Desktop software.

description: GIS data file used by ArcGIS Desktop, a mapping and visualization software package; contains a map layer and its data that can be imported into another map or globe; used for sharing self-contained map layers with others; can be uploaded to the ArcGIS Online service for sharing over the Internet.
